paragraphs.original: 话说宝玉见了贾政，回至房中，更觉头昏脑闷，懒怠动弹，连饭也没吃，便昏沉睡去。仍旧延医诊治，服药不效，索性连人也认不明白了。大家扶著他坐起来，还是像个好人。一连闹了几天。那日恰是“回九”之期，说是若不过去，薛姨妈脸上过不去；若说去呢，宝玉这般光景，贾母明知是为黛玉而起，欲要告诉明白，又恐气急生变。宝钗是新媳妇，又难劝慰，必得姨妈过来才好。若不回九，姨妈嗔怪。便与王夫人凤姐商议道：“我看宝玉竟是魂不守舍，起动是不怕的。用两乘小轿，叫人扶著，从园里过去，应了回九的吉期；以后请姨妈过来安慰宝钗，偺们一心一计的调治宝玉，可不两全？”

paragraphs.original: 袭人听了这些话，又急，又笑，又痛。宝钗恰好同著莺儿过来，也听见了。便说道：“你放著病不保养，何苦说这些不吉利的话呢？老太太才安慰了些，你又生出事来。老太太一生疼你一个，如今八十多岁的人了，虽不图你的诰封，将来你成了人，老太太也看著乐一天，也不枉了老人家的苦心。太太更是不必说了，一生的心血精神抚养了你这一个儿子，若是半途死了，太太将来怎么样呢？我虽是薄命，也不至于此。－－据此三件看来，你就要死，那天也不容你死的，所以你是不能死的。只管安稳著养个四五天后，风邪散了，太和正气一足，自然这些邪病都没有了。”宝玉听了，竟是无言可答，半晌，方才嘻嘻的笑道：“你是好些时不和我说话了，这会子说这些大道理的话给谁听？”宝钗听了这话，便又说道：“实告诉你说罢：那两日你不知人事的时候，林妹妹已经亡故了。”宝玉忽然坐起，大声诧异道：“果真死了吗！”宝钗道：“果真死了，岂有红口白舌咒人死的呢！老太太、太太知道你姐妹和睦，你听见他死了，自然你也要死，所以不肯告诉你。”

She's so old that she's not thinking about her own title or rank, but she'd be happy to see you become a man, so you'd make her happy. Your mother has spent all her life bringing you up. If you were to die now, what would she think? I'm not one to worry about my own fate, but I wouldn't want to die. You've got three reasons to live, so you can't die. Just relax for another five days, and then you'll get better." Baochai's words made the young man feel speechless. After a while, he said, "You don't talk to me much these days. I'm not sure what you're talking about. You're just making a fuss."Baochai heard this and said, "I'll tell you the truth. For two days, you didn't know what was going on. Lin Daiyu had already died." Suddenly, the prince sat up and exclaimed, "Is that true?" Baochai said, "It's true. How could I say someone was dead just to make a joke?" Grandma and Grandmother knew you and Lin Daiyu were close friends. If you heard she was dead, you'd also die, so they didn't tell you."

paragraphs.original: 宝玉听了，不禁放声大哭，倒在床上，忽然眼前漆黑，辨不出方向，心中正自恍惚，只见眼前好像有人走来。宝玉茫然问道：“借问此是何处？”那人道：“此是阴司泉路。你寿未终，何故至此？”宝玉道：“适闻有一故人已死，遂寻访至此，不觉迷途。”那人道：“故人是谁？”宝玉道：“姑苏林黛玉。”那人冷笑道：“林黛玉生不同人，死不同鬼，无魂无魄，何处寻访？凡人魂魄，聚而成形，散而为气，生前聚之，死则散焉。常人尚无可寻访，何况林黛玉呢？汝快回去罢。”宝玉听了，呆了半晌，道：“既云死者，散也，又如何有这个‘阴司’呢？”那人冷笑道：“那‘阴司’，说有便有，说无就无，皆为世俗溺于生死之说，设言以警世。便道上天深怒愚人：或不守分安常；或生禄未终，自行夭折；或嗜淫欲，尚气逞凶，无故自殒者。特设此地狱，囚其魂魄，受无边的苦，以偿生前之罪。汝寻黛玉，是无故自陷也。且黛玉已归太虚幻境，汝若有心寻访，潜心修养，自然有时相见；如不安生，即以自行夭折之罪，囚禁阴司，除父母之外，图一见黛玉，终不能矣。”那人说毕，袖中取出一石，向宝玉心口掷来。
paragraphs.english: Jade heard this and burst into tears, lying on the bed and unable to see anything. As he lay there, he felt someone coming near. Jade asked, "Where am I?" The person replied, "This is the underworld. You haven't reached your time yet, so why are you here?" Jade replied, "I heard that an old friend had died, so I came to find them, but I got lost." The person asked, "Who was your old friend?" Jade replied, "Lin Daiyu from Suzhou." The person laughed coldly, "Lin Daiyu was born different from others, and died different from others. She has no soul or spirit, so where can you find her? Human souls come together to form a body, and when they die, they scatter. Even ordinary people are hard to find, let alone Lin Daiyu. Go back now." Jade was stunned for a while and asked, "If the dead have scattered, then how can there be this 'underworld'?" The person laughed coldly, "The 'underworld', whether it exists or not, is all because of people's ignorance of life and death. We humans are addicted to the concept of life and death, and we use it to warn othersYou are looking for Dahu, which is just adding trouble to yourself. And Dahu has already gone to the fantasy world, if you really want to visit, you can devote yourself to cultivation and you will have the chance to meet again; if you don't live well, you will be sentenced to suicide and be imprisoned in the underworld, and you will never see Dahu again except for your parents." After saying this, he took out a stone from his sleeve and threw it at Baoyu's heart.

paragraphs.original: 宝玉听了这话，又被这石子打著心窝，吓的即欲回家，只恨迷了道路。正在踌躇，忽听那边有人唤他。回首看时，不是别人，正是贾母、王夫人、宝钗、袭人等围绕哭泣叫著，自己仍旧躺在床上。见案上红灯，窗前皓月，依然锦绣丛中，繁华世界。定神一想，原来竟是一场大梦。浑身冷汗，觉得心内清爽。仔细一想，真正无可奈何，不过长叹数声。
paragraphs.english: Bao Yuhai heard this and was so shocked that he was afraid to go home, but he didn't know the way. As he hesitated, he suddenly heard someone calling him. Turning around, it was none other than his grandmother, Lady Wang, Lady Xie, and his cousin Bao Chao, who were all crying around him. But he was still lying in bed. Looking at the red lamp on the desk and the bright moonlight outside the window, he was still in the midst of flowers and luxuries. After a moment of reflection, he realized that it was just a dream. He was soaked in cold sweat and felt refreshed. After a moment of reflection, he realized that there was nothing he could do and sighed several times.

paragraphs.english: At the beginning, Baochai knew that Lin Daiyu was already dead. Since the elders didn't allow them to tell Baoyu, fearing that his condition would worsen, and Baochai knew that Baoyu's illness was caused by Lin Daiyu, losing the jade was only a secondary reason. Therefore, she took the opportunity to explain, hoping that Baoyu would completely sever ties and restore his mind and soul, in order to cure his illness. Later, when Baoyu woke up, they were relieved and immediately invited Doctor Bi to examine him.
paragraphs.chinese: 一开始，宝钗就知道黛玉已经死了。由于贾母等人不允许告诉宝玉，怕他病情加重，而宝钗深知宝玉的病是因为黛玉而起，失玉只是次要原因。所以趁势说明，让宝玉彻底决绝，神魂归一，以期治愈。贾母、王夫人等人不知道宝钗的用意，责怪她鲁莽，后来见宝玉醒了过来，才放心，立刻请了毕大夫来看诊。

paragraphs.original: 那大夫进来诊了脉，便道：“奇怪！这回脉气沉静，神安郁散，明日进调理的药，就可以望好了。”说著出去。众人各自安心散去。袭人起初深怨宝钗不该告诉，惟是口中不好说出。莺儿背地也说宝钗道：“姑娘忒性急了。”宝钗道：“你知道什么？好歹横竖有我呢。”那宝钗任人诽谤，并不介意，只窥察宝玉心病，暗下针砭。
paragraphs.english: The doctor came in and took the pulse. "It's strange! This pulse is quiet and serene, with a depressed spirit. Tomorrow, take some medicine to regulate it and you'll be better." After saying this, he left. Everyone went their separate ways, each content. Xiren, at first, was angry that Baoshui had told, but couldn't say it. Ying'er whispered to Baoshui, "You're too hasty." Baoshui said, "What do you know? I'll take care of it." Baoshui, despite being slandered, doesn't care, but watches over Baoyu's mental illness and administers medicine in secret.
paragraphs.chinese: 大夫进来诊了脉，说：“奇怪！这次脉气沉静，神安郁散，明天吃调理的药，就能好了。”说完出去了。众人各自安心散去。袭人一开始很怨恨宝钗不该告诉，但嘴里说不出。莺儿私下对宝钗说：“姑娘太急了。”宝钗道：“你知道什么？不管怎样，有我在呢。”宝钗任人诽谤，不介意，只观察宝玉的心病，暗下针砭。

paragraphs.original: 一日，宝玉渐觉神志安定，虽一时想起黛玉尚有糊涂。更有袭人缓缓的将“老爷选定的宝姑娘为人和厚，嫌林姑娘秉性古怪，原恐早夭。老太太恐你不知好歹，病中著急，所以叫雪雁过来哄你”的话，时常劝解。宝玉终是心酸落泪。欲待寻死，又想著梦中之言；又恐老太太、太太生气；又不得撩开。又想黛玉已死，宝钗又是第一等人物，方信“金玉姻缘”有定，自己也解了好些。
paragraphs.english: One day, as the days passed, Baoyu gradually came to his senses, but he was still unclear about where he had been and what he had seen. Xiren continued to comfort him, saying that the Master had chosen a good wife, but he was worried about Lin's strange ways and that she might die early. Granny was afraid that Baoyu would not understand and would worry him, so she sent Xueyan to comfort him. Baoyu was still weeping, and he thought of killing himself, but then he remembered what he had dreamed, and he was afraid of Granny and Mother's anger, so he did not do it. He also thought that Lin had died, and that the Master's wife was the best of the best, so he believed that the "Jin-yu Marriage" was fated, and he was able to let go of his worries.
paragraphs.chinese: 有一天，宝玉渐渐恢复了神智，但一时间仍然想起黛玉还有糊涂的地方。袭人也一直劝解他，说老爷选的宝姑娘为人和厚，嫌林姑娘秉性古怪，担心她早夭。老太太怕宝玉不知好歹，病中着急，所以叫雪雁过来哄他。宝玉听了还是心酸落泪。他想寻死，但又想起梦中的话；又怕老太太、太太生气，所以没有这样做。他又想黛玉已经死了，宝钗又是第一等人物，才相信“金玉姻缘”有定数，自己也解开了心结。

paragraphs.original: 宝钗看来不妨大事，于是自己心也安了，只在贾母王夫人等前尽行过家庭之礼后，便设法以释宝玉之忧。宝玉虽不能时常坐起，亦常见宝钗坐在床前，禁不住生来旧病。宝钗每以正言解劝，以“养身要紧，你我既为夫妇，岂在一时”之语安慰他。
paragraphs.english: Xue Baochai felt that the matter would not be serious, so she felt at ease in her heart. She planned to pay respects to Lady Jia and Lady Wang in front of the bed to alleviate Bao Yu's worries. Although Bao Yu could not sit up frequently, Xue Baochai would sit beside the bed, making Bao Yu feel warm. Every time Xue Baochai would use her righteous words to comfort Bao Yu, telling him the道理 that "taking care of oneself is important, and you and I are married, so we don't need to worry about a moment's absence".
paragraphs.chinese: 薛宝钗觉得事情不会太严重，于是心里也感到安心了。她打算在贾母和王夫人的面前行礼，以此来缓解宝玉的忧愁。虽然宝玉不能经常坐起来，但是薛宝钗会坐在床前，让宝玉感到温暖。每次薛宝钗都会用正言劝慰宝玉，告诉他“养身要紧，你我既为夫妇，岂在一时”的道理。

paragraphs.original: 那宝玉心里虽不顺遂，无奈日里贾母王夫人及薛姨妈等轮流相伴，夜间宝钗独去安寝，贾母又派人服侍，只得安心静养。又见宝钗举动温柔，就也渐渐的将爱慕黛玉的心肠略移在宝钗身上。－－此是后话。
paragraphs.english: Although Bao Yuyu was not happy, during the day he was taken care of by Grandma, Mrs. Wang and Mrs. Xue in turn, and at night only Bao Chao was with him. Grandma also sent someone to serve him. He had to be content with it. He also saw Bao Chao's gentle and considerate personality, and gradually transferred his thoughts of liking Lin Daiyu to Bao Chao. This was a later event.
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉心里虽然不高兴，但白天有贾母、王夫人和薛姨妈轮流照顾，晚上只有宝钗一个人陪她，贾母还派人服侍。他只好安心静养。又看到宝钗温柔体贴，渐渐地把喜欢黛玉的心思转移到了宝钗身上。这是后来的事。

paragraphs.original: 却说宝玉成家的那一日，黛玉白日已经昏晕过去，却心头口中一丝微气不断，把个李纨和紫鹃哭的死去活来。到了晚间，黛玉却又缓过来了，微微睁开眼，似有要水要汤的光景。此时雪雁已去，只有紫鹃和李纨在旁。紫鹃便端了一盏桂元汤和的梨汁，用小银匙灌了两三匙。黛玉闭著眼，静养了一会子，觉得心里似明似暗的。此时李纨见黛玉略缓，明知是“回光返照”的光景，却料著还有一半天耐头，自己回到稻香村，料理了一回事情。
paragraphs.english: On the day of the marriage, Lin Daiyu was already asleep during the day. Li Wang and Zui Juan were very sad. At night, Lin Daiyu came to her senses and slightly opened her eyes, as if she wanted to drink water. At this time, Xue Yan had left, and only Zui Juan and Li Wang were beside her. Zui Juan brought a bowl of osmanthus soup and pear juice, and fed her with a silver spoon a few spoons. Lin Daiyu closed her eyes and rested for a while, and her mind seemed to be clear. At this time, Li Wang saw that Lin Daiyu had come to her senses, and knew that she still had half a day to support herself. She returned to the Rice Fragrance Cottage and dealt with a few things.
paragraphs.chinese: 那天宝玉结婚的时候，黛玉白天已经昏睡过去。李纨和紫鹃哭得很伤心。到了晚上，黛玉缓过来了，微微睁开眼睛，似乎想要喝水。此时雪雁已经离开了，只有紫鹃和李纨在旁边。紫鹃端来一碗桂元汤和梨汁，用小银匙喂了两三匙。黛玉闭着眼睛，静养了一会子，心里似乎明明白白的。此时李纨看到黛玉缓过来了，知道她还有半天的时间可以支撑。她回到稻香村，处理了一点事情。

paragraphs.original: 这里黛玉睁开眼一看，只有紫鹃和奶妈并几个小丫头在那里，便一手攥了紫鹃的手，使著劲说道：“我是不中用的人了！你伏侍我几年，我原指望偺们两个总在一处，不想我－－”说著，又喘了一会子，闭了眼歇著。紫鹃见他攥著不肯松手，自己也不敢挪动。看他的光景，比早半天好些，只当还可以回转，听了这话，又寒了半截。
paragraphs.english: Daiyu opened her eyes and saw only Zuis and her wet nurse and a few little maids by her side. She held Zuis's hand tightly and said, "I'm useless now. You've taken care of me for a few years, and I always thought we two could be together. But I——" She took a deep breath and closed her eyes to rest. Zuis saw that she was holding her hand tightly and dared not move. She saw her expression was better than it had been earlier in the morning, thinking she would get better, but she didn't expect it to turn out like this.
paragraphs.chinese: 黛玉睁开眼睛一看，只有紫鹃和奶妈及几个小丫头在身边，她紧紧地握著紫鹃的手，说道：“我是个没用的人了！你照顾我几年，我原想着我们两个总能在一起，没想到我——”说完，又喘了一会，闭上眼睛休息。紫鹃见她握著手不肯松开，自己也不敢动。看着她的样子，比早半天好些，以为还能好起来，没想到会变成这样。

paragraphs.original: 半天，黛玉又说道：“妹妹！我这里并没亲人，我的身子是乾净的，你好歹叫他们送我回去！”说到这里，又闭了眼不言语了，那手却渐渐紧了，喘成一处，只是出气大，入气小，已经促疾的很了。紫鹃慌了，连忙叫人请李纨，可巧探春来了。紫鹃见了，忙悄悄的说道：“三姑娘！瞧瞧林姑娘罢！”说著，泪如雨下。探春过来，摸了摸黛玉的手，已经凉了，连目光也都散了。
paragraphs.english: Half a day, Daiyu said again, "Sister! I have no relatives here, my body is pure, you must hurry and send me back!" She said this, closed her eyes, and stopped talking. Her hand tightened, and her breathing became more and more urgent, indicating that her condition was already very serious. Zhijuan was in a panic and called for Liwan. Just then, Chun came. Zhijuan saw her and whispered to Chun, "Miss Chun, please look at Lin! " She burst into tears like rain. Chun came over and touched Dahuai's hand, which was already cold, and her eyes were scattered.
paragraphs.chinese: 半天，黛玉又说：“妹妹！我这里没有亲人，我的身体是干净的，你赶快叫人送我回去！”说到这里，她闭上了眼睛，不再说话，手却越来越紧，呼吸也变得急促，已经很严重了。紫鹃慌了神，赶紧叫人请李纨，正好探春来了。紫鹃见了，悄悄地对探春说：“三姑娘，看看林姑娘吧！”说着，眼泪像雨一样流下来。探春过来摸了摸黛玉的手，已经凉了，目光也散了。

paragraphs.original: 探春紫鹃正哭著，叫人端水来给黛玉擦洗，李纨赶忙进来了。三个人才见了，不及说话。刚擦著，猛听黛玉直声叫道：“宝玉！宝玉！你好－－”说到“好”字，便浑身冷汗，不作声了。紫鹃等急忙扶住，那汗愈出，身子便渐渐的冷了。探春李纨叫人乱著拢头穿衣，只见黛玉两眼一翻。呜呼！香魂一缕随风散，愁绪三更入梦遥！
paragraphs.english: Zhu Jue and Chun were crying, and Zhu Jue called for water to wash D’Ely’s face. Li Wan hurried in. The three of them saw each other, but said nothing. Just when the sweat had been wiped off, D’Ely suddenly called out “Bao-yu! Bao-yu! How could you－” She stopped at the word “you”. Zhu Jue and the others hurried to hold her. The sweat kept coming. D’Ely’s body began to grow cold. Chun and Li Wan hurried to get her hair and clothes in order. D’Ely’s eyes rolled up. Oh! D’Ely’s soul had flown away with the wind. Her sorrow would not be calmed even in her sleep.
paragraphs.chinese: 紫鹃和探春正在哭，叫人拿水给黛玉擦洗，李纨赶忙进来了。三个人见了，没有说话。刚擦了一下，黛玉突然直声叫道：“宝玉！宝玉！你好－－”说到“好”字，便浑身冷汗，不再出声了。紫鹃等急忙扶住，黛玉的汗越来越多，身体也渐渐地冷了。探春和李纨叫人乱乱地给她拢头穿衣，只见黛玉两眼一翻。唉！黛玉的魂魄随着风散去了，她的愁绪在梦中久久不能平息。

paragraphs.original: 当时黛玉气绝，正是宝玉娶宝钗的这个时辰。紫鹃等都大哭起来。李纨、探春想他素日的可疼，今日更加可怜，便也伤心痛哭。因潇湘馆离新房子甚远，所以那边并没听见。一时，大家痛哭了一阵，只听得远远一阵音乐之声，侧耳一听，却又没有了。探春、李纨走出院外再听时，惟有竹梢风动，月影移墙，好不凄凉冷淡！一时叫了林之孝家的过来，将黛玉停放毕，派人看守，等明早去回凤姐。
paragraphs.english: At that time, when the spirit of the late Lin Daiyu had gone, it was the moment when Bi Yu was marrying Bi Chao. Zi Juan and others wept. Li Wan and Zhu Cun, recalling their love for the late Lin Daiyu, were deeply saddened and wept. Because the Xiaoxiang Garden was far from the new house, no one there heard the sound. Then, everyone wept for a while, and suddenly heard music in the distance. When they listened carefully, they found that there was no sound. Zhu Cun and Li Wan stepped out of the courtyard to listen again, only to hear the rustling of bamboo leaves and the shadows of the moon moving across the wall, a scene of great sadness and loneliness. Then, they called Lin Zhihao's mother over to arrange for the late Lin Daiyu to be placed in a good place and sent someone to guard it, waiting to report to Fengzheng the next day.
paragraphs.chinese: 当时黛玉气绝，正是宝玉娶宝钗的时候。紫鹃等人痛哭起来。李纨、探春想起黛玉平日的可疼，今日更加可怜，也伤心痛哭。因为潇湘馆离新房子很远，所以那边没有听到。一时，大家痛哭一阵，只听远远传来一阵音乐声，侧耳一听，却又没有了。探春、李纨走出院外再听时，只有竹梢风吹，月影移墙，好不凄凉冷淡！一时叫了林之孝家的过来，将黛玉停放好，派人看守，等明天去回凤姐。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐因见贾母王夫人等忙乱，贾政起身，又为宝玉昏愦更甚，正在著急异常之时，若是又将黛玉的凶信回了，恐贾母王夫人愁苦交加，急出病来，只得亲自到园。到了潇湘馆内，也不免哭了一场。见了李纨探春，知道诸事齐备，就说：“很好。只是刚才你们为什么不言语，叫我著急？”探春道：“刚才送老爷，怎么说呢？”凤姐道：“这倒是你们两个可怜他些。这么著，我还得那边去招呼那个冤家呢。但是这件事好累坠！若是今日不回，使不得；若回了，恐怕老太太搁不住。”李纨道：“你去见机行事，得回再回方好。”凤姐点头，忙忙的去了。
paragraphs.english:
Feng Ji saw that Jia Mother, Wang Fei, and others were in a hurry. If the bad news about Daiyu were to be told, she feared that Jia Mother and Wang Fei would be overburdened with grief and worry, and would fall ill. She therefore went to Xiao Xiang Guan in person. When she got there, she wept. She saw Liwan and Chun and learned that everything was ready. "It's all right," she said. "But why don't you speak, and let me worry?" Chun said, "What can we say when we just sent off the old man?" Feng Ji said, "You are all so pitiful. But it really does take a lot of effort. If we don't return today, we can't; if we do return, we fear that the old lady won't be able to bear it." Liwan said, "You should go and see what you can do, and come back if you can." Feng Ji nodded and hurried off.

中文原文：

贾母、王夫人、宝玉听了，便知黛玉已死，三个人都哭起来。王夫人哭到气噎喉痹，不能言语。贾母搀着王夫人，
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐见贾母、王夫人等人忙乱，又见宝玉昏昏沉沉更甚，非常着急。如果再告诉黛玉的凶信，怕贾母、王夫人愁苦交加，急出病来，只得亲自到潇湘馆。到了那里，也哭了一场。见到李纨、探春，知道一切已经准备好了，就说：“很好。只是你们为什么不说话，让我着急？”探春说：“刚才送老爷，说什么好呢？”凤姐说：“这真是你们可怜他啊。不过，这件事真累人！若是今天不回，使不得；若回了，恐怕老太太受不了。”李纨说：“你去见机行事，得回再回方好。”凤姐点头，急忙离开了。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐到了宝玉那里，听见大夫说不妨事，贾母王夫人略觉放心，凤姐便背了宝玉缓缓的将黛玉的事回明了。贾母王夫人听得，都吓了一大跳。贾母眼泪交流，说道：“是我弄坏了他了！但只是这个丫头也忒傻气！”说著，便要到园里去哭他一场，又惦记著宝玉，两头难顾。王夫人等含悲共劝贾母：“不必过去，老太太身子要紧。”
paragraphs.english: After the doctor said that everything was fine, the mother and wife of the family were a little more at ease. Fengjie slowly told them about Lin Daiyu's matter. When the mother and wife heard it, they were both shocked. The mother was crying, saying: "It's all my fault! But this girl is too stupid!" She wanted to go to the garden to cry, but she was worried about Yu, and she couldn't take care of both sides. Wangfen and everyone else advised the mother: "Don't go, your body is more important."
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐去了宝玉那里，听到大夫说没事了，贾母和王夫人稍稍放心了一点，凤姐就慢慢把黛玉的事告诉了他们。贾母和王夫人听到了，都吓了一跳。贾母眼泪直流，说：“是我害了他啊！但这个丫头也太傻了！”说着，她想去园子里哭一场，但又担心宝玉，两边都顾不上了。王夫人和大家一起劝贾母：“不必去了，老太太的身体要紧。”

paragraphs.original: 贾母无奈，只得叫王夫人自去。又说：“你替我告诉他的阴灵：‘并不是我忍心不来送你，只为有个亲疏。你是我的外孙女儿，是亲的了；若与宝玉比起来，可是宝玉比你更亲些。倘宝玉有些不好，我怎么见他父亲呢！’”说著，又哭起来。王夫人劝道：“林姑娘是老太太最疼的，但只寿夭有定，如今已经死了，无可尽心，只是葬礼上要上等的发送。一则可以少尽偺们的心；二则就是姑太太和外甥女儿的阴灵儿也可以少安了。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Mote had no choice but to let Wang Fu handle it on her own. She also said: "I tell you his ghost: I didn't come to send him off intentionally, but it's because of our closeness. You are my granddaughter, close; but if compared with Bao Yuyu, Yuyu is closer. If Yuyu has any bad luck, how can I face his father?" She said, and cried again. Wang Fu advised, "Lin Qia is the most beloved by Grandma Jia, but the length of life is predetermined. Now that she has died, we can't do anything but to do our best in the funeral. This can somewhat show our kindness; two, it's also the grandmother and the niece's spirits can somewhat be at ease."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母无可奈何，只好让王夫人自行处理。她又说：“我告诉你他的阴灵：我不是故意不来送他，只是因为有亲疏关系。你是我的外孙女儿，是亲近的；但如果和宝玉相比，宝玉比你更亲近一些。假如宝玉有什么不好，我怎么面对他的父亲呢！”说着，又哭了起来。王夫人劝道：“林姑娘是老太太最疼爱的，但寿命的长短是注定的。如今她已经死了，我们已经无法尽心，只是在葬礼上要尽上最好的礼。这样可以稍微尽些心意；二来，也是姑太太和外甥女的阴灵可以稍微安息。”

paragraphs.original: 贾母听到这里，越发痛哭起来。凤姐恐怕老人家伤感太过，明仗著宝玉心中不甚明白，便偷偷的使人来撒个谎儿，哄老太太道：“宝玉那里找老太太呢。”贾母听见，才止住泪问道：“不是又有什么缘故？”凤姐陪笑道：“没什么缘故，他大约是想老太太的意思。”贾母连忙扶了珍珠儿，凤姐也跟著过来。走至半路，正遇王夫人过来，一一回明了贾母，贾母自然又是哀痛的，只因要到宝玉那边，只得忍泪含悲的说道：“既这么著，我也不过去了，由你们办罢。我看著心里也难受，只别委屈了他就是了。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Ma heard this and burst into tears. Fengqiang was afraid that Jia Ma was too upset, so he sent someone in secret to tell a lie to her, saying that "Bao Yuyi was looking for Jia Ma." Jia Ma heard this and stopped crying and asked, "Is there any reason?" Fengqiang smiled and said, "There is no reason, he probably just misses Jia Ma." Jia Ma immediately supported herself with Zhujiang and Fengqiang followed her. On the way, they met Wang Fu coming over and told Jia Ma everything. Jia Ma was naturally sad, but she had to hold back her tears and said, "Since that's the case, I won't go anymore, just let you deal with it. I can see it, but I'm also very sad, just don't make him suffer."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母听到这里，更加痛哭起来。凤姐怕老太太太过伤心，明着靠着宝玉的心思不明白，就偷偷地派人来撒谎，哄老太太说：“宝玉在找老太太呢。”贾母听后，才止住泪水问道：“是不是又有什么原因？”凤姐陪笑道：“没有什么原因，他大概是想老太太的意思。”贾母连忙扶着珍珠儿，凤姐也跟着过来。走到半路，正遇上王夫人过来，向贾母一一回明了情况，贾母自然是哀痛的，只是因为要到宝玉那边，只得忍泪含悲地说：“既然这样，我也不过去了，由你们自己处理吧。我看在眼里，心里也很难受，只是别委屈了他就是了。”

paragraphs.original: 王夫人凤姐一一答应了，贾母才过宝玉这边来，见了宝玉，因问：“你做什么找我？”宝玉笑道：“我昨日晚上看见林妹妹来了，他说要回南去。我想没人留的住，还得老太太给我留一留他。”贾母听著，说：“使得，只管放心罢。”袭人因扶宝玉躺下。
paragraphs.english: Mrs. Wang and Mrs. Feng both agreed, and the Grandmother came to see Bao-Yu. When she saw Bao-Yu, she asked, "What are you doing looking for me?" Bao-Yu laughed and said, "Last night I saw Lin-Yi'er come. He said he was going back to the south. I thought nobody could keep him, so I wanted the old lady to keep him for me." The Grandmother said, "Okay, don't worry." Xisi helped Bao-Yu lie down.
paragraphs.chinese: 王夫人和凤姐都答应了，贾母才来宝玉这里，见了宝玉，问：“你做什么找我？”宝玉笑道：“我昨晚看见林妹妹来了，他说要回南方去。我想没有人留得住他，还得老太太给我留一留他。”贾母听了，说：“可以，只管放心吧。”袭人扶宝玉躺下。

paragraphs.original: 贾母出来，到宝钗这边来。那时宝钗尚未回九，所以每每见了人，倒有些含羞之意。这一天，见贾母满面泪痕，递了茶，贾母叫他坐下。宝钗侧身陪著坐了，才问道：“听得林妹妹病了，不知他可好些了？”贾母听了这话，那眼泪止不住流下来，因说道：“我的儿！我告诉你，你可别告诉宝玉。都是因你林妹妹，才叫你受了多少委屈！你如今作媳妇了，我才告诉你，这如今你林妹妹没了两三天了，就是娶你的那个时辰死的。如今宝玉这一番病，还是为著这个。你们先都在园子里，自然也都是明白的。”宝钗把脸飞红了；想到黛玉之死，又不免落下泪来。贾母又说了一回话，去了。
paragraphs.english: Jia Mo came out and went to see Baochai. That day, Baochai hadn't gone back to her room yet, so she was a little shy when she saw people. That day, seeing Jia Mo with tears in her eyes, Baochai gave her a cup of tea. Jia Mo called her to sit down. Baochai sat to the side and sat with her, asking, "I heard that Lin Erhui is sick. Don't you know if she's better now?" Jia Mo heard this and couldn't help crying, saying, "My dear! I'll tell you, you mustn't tell Baoyu. It's all because of your Lin Erhui that you've suffered so much. Now that you're married, I'll tell you. Lin Erhui has been dead for two or three days, and she died at the time you were married. That's why Baoyu is sick now. You know that, don't you?" Baochai's face turned red. Thinking of Lin Erhui's death, she couldn't help crying. Jia Mo talked for a while and left.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母出来，到宝钗这边来。那天，宝钗还没有回九，所以她见了人有些害羞。这一天，见贾母满脸泪痕，宝钗递了茶。贾母叫他坐下。宝钗侧身陪著坐了，才问道：“听说林妹妹病了，不知道她好些了？”贾母听了这话，眼泪止不住流下来，说：“我的儿！我告诉你，你可别告诉宝玉。都是因为你林妹妹，才叫你受了多少委屈！你如今作媳妇了，我才告诉你，这如今你林妹妹没了两三天了，就是娶你的那个时辰死的。如今宝玉这一番病，还是为著这个。你们先都在园子里，自然也都是明白的。”宝钗脸飞红了；想到黛玉之死，又不免落下泪来。贾母又说了一回话，去了。

paragraphs.original: 自此，宝钗千回万转，想了一个主意，只不肯造次，所以过了回九，才想出这个法子来。如今果然好些，然后大家说话才不至似前留神。独是宝玉虽然病势一天好似一天，他的痴心总不能解，必要亲去哭他一场。贾母等知他病未除根，不许他胡思乱想，怎奈他郁闷难堪，病多反覆，倒是大夫看出心病，索性叫他开散了再用药调理，倒可好得快些。
paragraphs.english: From then on, Baochai came up with a plan but didn't rush to put it into action. She took nine days to come up with a solution. Now things are looking better, but people still speak with caution when they talk. Although Yueming's illness was getting better, he couldn't help but want to visit the grave. The elders knew he hadn't fully recovered and didn't want him to dwell on his illness, but Yueming was too unhappy to recover quickly. Fortunately, the doctor noticed his emotional state and told him to take a break before treating him, which helped him recover more quickly.
paragraphs.chinese: 自此，宝钗想了一个主意，但不着急，过了九天，才想出这个办法。现在看起来好多了，但大家说话时还是小心谨慎。只是宝玉虽然病得越来越轻，但他却总不能放下心来，一定要去哭一哭。贾母等人知道他病未根除，不许他胡思乱想，但宝玉郁闷难耐，病多反复，倒是医生看出他的心病，索性叫他散散心，再用药调理，倒可好得快些。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉听说，立刻要往潇湘馆来。贾母等只得叫人抬了竹椅子过来，扶宝玉坐上，贾母王夫人即便先行。到了潇湘馆内，一见黛玉灵柩，贾母已哭得泪乾气绝，凤姐等再三劝住。王夫人也哭了一场。李纨便请贾母王夫人在里间歇著，犹自落泪。
paragraphs.english: Upon hearing this, Baoyu immediately wanted to go to Xiangxiang Pavilion. The Old Lady and the Madam had to order someone to carry a bamboo chair and support Baoyu onto it. The Old Lady and Madam went ahead, and when they arrived at Xiangxiang Pavilion, they saw Lin Daiyu's coffin. The Old Lady cried so hard that she was almost out of breath, and the ladies had to console her. The Madam also cried and sat down in the inner room. Liwan invited the Old Lady and Madam to rest, but they still cried.
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉听说后，立刻要前往潇湘馆。贾母等人只得叫人抬了竹椅子过来，扶宝玉坐上。贾母和王夫人先行，到了潇湘馆内，一见黛玉的灵柩，贾母已哭得泪干气绝，凤姐等人再三劝阻。王夫人也哭了一场。李纨便请贾母和王夫人在里间歇息，两人仍然在流泪。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉一到，想起未病之先，常到这里，今日屋在人亡，不禁嚎啕大哭。想起从前何等亲密，今日死别，怎不更加伤感？众人原恐宝玉病后过哀，都来解劝。宝玉已经哭得死去活来，大家搀扶歇息。其馀随来的，如宝钗俱极痛哭。独是宝玉必要叫紫鹃来见，“问明姑娘临死有何话说。”紫鹃本来深恨宝玉，见如此，心里已回过来些；又有贾母王夫人都在这里，不敢洒落宝玉：便将林姑娘怎么复病，怎么烧毁帕子，焚化诗稿，并将临死说的话一一的都告诉了。宝玉又哭得气噎喉乾。探春趁便又将黛玉临终嘱咐带柩回南的话也说了一遍。贾母王夫人又哭起来。多亏凤姐能言劝慰，略略止些，便请贾母等回去。宝玉那里肯舍。无奈贾母逼著，只得勉强回房。
paragraphs.english: Baoyu arrived, thinking of how he used to come here before he fell ill, and how the house was left empty with the owner gone. He couldn't help bursting into tears. He was thinking of how close he used to be with Lin Daiyu, and how much sadder it was to be separated from her today. Everyone was afraid that Baoyu would be too sad after his illness, so they came to comfort him. Baoyu had cried himself almost to death. Everyone had to help him sit down and rest. The others who had come with him, such as Baochai, were all very sad. Only Baoyu wanted to call Zhi Juan to see him, and ask her what Lin Daiyu had said before she died. Zhi Juan had always been angry with Baoyu, but seeing him like this, she began to think differently. And there were Jialoumo and Wang Feifei here, so she was afraid to be too rude to Baoyu. She told him about how Lin Daiyu had gotten sick again, how she had burned the handkerchief, and how she had burned all her poems. She also told him what Lin Daiyu had said before she died. Baoyu cried even
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉一到，想起未病之先，常到这里，今日屋在人亡，不禁嚎啕大哭。想起从前何等亲密，今日死别，怎不更加伤感？众人原恐宝玉病后过哀，都来解劝。宝玉已经哭得死去活来，大家搀扶歇息。其馀随来的，如宝钗俱极痛哭。独是宝玉必要叫紫鹃来见，“问明姑娘临死有何话说。”紫鹃本来深恨宝玉，见如此，心里已回过来些；又有贾母王夫人都在这里，不敢洒落宝玉：便将林姑娘怎么复病，怎么烧毁帕子，焚化诗稿，并将临死说的话一一的都告诉了。宝玉又哭得气噎喉乾。探春趁便又将黛玉临终嘱咐带柩回南的话也说了一遍。贾母王夫人又哭起来。多亏凤姐能言劝慰，略略止些，便请贾母等回去。宝玉那里肯舍。无奈贾母逼著，只得勉强回房。

paragraphs.original: 贾母有了年纪的人，打从宝玉病起，日夜不宁，今又大痛一阵，已觉头晕身热，虽是不放心，惦著宝玉，却也扎挣不住，回到自己房中睡下。王夫人更加心痛难禁，也便回去，派了彩云帮著袭人照应，并说：“宝玉若再悲戚，速来告诉我们。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Mother is getting old, and since Baoyu became ill, she has been very uneasy every day. Today she is in severe pain and feels dizzy and feverish. Although she is very concerned about Baoyu, she can no longer bear it and returns to her own room to sleep. Lady Wang is also very sad and goes back to take care of Baoyu, sending Caiyun and Xisi to help, and says, "If Baoyu is sad again, let us know as soon as possible."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母年纪大了，自从宝玉生病以来，她每天都很不安。今天又痛得厉害，已经感到头晕发热。尽管她很担心宝玉，但已经撑不住了，回到自己房间睡觉。王夫人也很难过，就回去照顾宝玉，派了彩云和袭人一起帮忙，并说：“如果宝玉再悲伤，尽快告诉我们。”

paragraphs.original: 宝钗知是宝玉一时必不能舍，也不相劝，只用讽刺的话说他。宝玉倒恐宝钗多心，也便饮泣收心。歇了一夜，倒也安稳。明日一早，众人都来瞧他，但觉气虚身弱，心病倒觉去了几分。于是加意调养，渐渐的好起来。贾母幸不成病，惟是王夫人心痛未痊。那日薛姨妈过来探望，看见宝玉精神略好，也就放心，暂且住下。
paragraphs.english: Baoshai knew that Baoyu would not leave for a while and did not persuade him, but teased him with sarcastic words. Baoyu was afraid that Baoshai would be angry, so he could only shed tears silently and put his heart away. After resting for a night, he was also sound asleep. The next day, everyone came to visit him, and found that he was weak in body but his heart disease had lessened. So he was carefully taken care of and gradually recovered. Jiamo was not ill, but only the pain in Wangfeng's heart had not healed. That day, Xueyima came to visit and saw that Baoyu's spirit had improved, so she was relieved and temporarily stayed there.
paragraphs.chinese: 宝钗知道宝玉一时舍不得离开，也不劝说，只用讽刺的话说他。宝玉担心宝钗生气，也只好默默流泪，收起心来。歇了一夜，倒也安稳。第二天，大家都来看他，发现他气虚身弱，但心病减轻了。于是精心调养，渐渐地好起来。贾母没有生病，只是王夫人的心痛没有痊愈。那天薛姨妈过来探望，看到宝玉的精神好转，也就放心了，暂时住在了那里。

paragraphs.original: 一日，贾母特请薛姨妈过去商量，说：“宝玉的命，都亏姨太太救的。如今想来不妨了。独委屈了你的姑娘。如今宝玉调养百日，身体复旧，又过了娘娘的功服，正好圆房：要求姨太太作主，另择个上好的吉日。”薛姨妈便道：“老太太主意很好，何必问我？宝丫头虽生的粗笨，心里却还是极明白的，他的情性，老太太素日是知道的。但愿他们两口儿言和意顺，从此老太太也省好些心，我姐姐也安慰些，我也放了心了。老太太就定个日子。还通知亲戚不用呢？”贾母道：“宝玉和你们姑娘生来第一件大事，况且费了多少周折，如今才得安逸，必要大家热闹几天。亲戚都要请的。一来酬愿，二则偺们吃杯喜酒，也不枉我老人家操了好些心。”
